title: Root
description: The root of this tree.  The title of this node sets the title of the tree.  You must have one tree called "Root".  You can set tree-wide properties on this node and reference them in other places with the following template syntax: `{{key_name}}`.

b831eeeb-4953-4c55-b0fd-1944dbc41b7b.name: Sequence
b831eeeb-4953-4c55-b0fd-1944dbc41b7b.title: Sequence
b831eeeb-4953-4c55-b0fd-1944dbc41b7b.description: Takes multiple children and runs them from top to bottom (or left to right).  If any fail, this node fails, if all succeed, this node succeeds.

982d9224-d9ce-4248-8b47-91b30d67c40d.name: Wait
982d9224-d9ce-4248-8b47-91b30d67c40d.title: wait(1)
982d9224-d9ce-4248-8b47-91b30d67c40d.description: "Pauses" the bot for the specified number of seconds.  You can specify two numbers (like `wait(1,10)`) to wait a random number of seconds between those numbers.
